reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed there in Feb of 07 - the hotel had just opened (or so it seemed).
reviews.title: Decent hotel (if its style is your bag)
An Excellent place to stay
reviews.text: There weren't even numbers on the doors or a sign in the front.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were there for a quick weekend getaway, and very much enjoyed the privacy and quiet that the hotel provided - it seemed we were the only ones there...which was at least partially true.
reviews.title: Perfection!

reviews.text: We'd never stayed in the 1st arr before - it's OK but we prefer the other bank.
reviews.title: Great
